name: custom-dex-contracts
description: Custom DEX contracts for Arc Testnet

scripts.deploy:arc:tokens: cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=tokens hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network arcTestnet
scripts.deploy:arc:factory: cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=factory hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network arcTestnet
scripts.deploy:arc:all: cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=all hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network arcTestnet
